tickets.shortDescription: Tickets table still appears when there are no tickets
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Delete all tickets in Firebase
2. Log in to Bug Tracker
3. Visit Dashboard

tickets.bugName: Create Bug Form Submits with Missing Field
tickets.shortDescription: Create bug form should not be able to submitted with required fields either empty or blank
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Click Submit New Bug in navbar
2. Click submit to submit new empty ticket

tickets.shortDescription: Missing fields on Create Bug Form don't show up in error
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Click Submit New Bug in navbar
2. Submit form empty
3. Error should appear above buttons at the bottom, but they don't

tickets.shortDescription: Clicking submit on edit bug screen fails
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Click on any ticket in tickets table
2. Change any field to something not empty or Select
3. Click submit to see app crash

tickets.shortDescription: My Bugs page does not filter by user
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to My Bugs page
2. You will see all tickets available, regardless of name

tickets.shortDescription: Changing entries option when not on 1st page makes table act weird
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to tickets table
2. Click on 3 at bottom of table
3. Change entries shown selection to anything else

tickets.longDescription: Error Message: Cannot read property value of 'null'
tickets.shortDescription: App crashes when a user starts to type in the search field
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to dashboard
2. Type in search field of tickets table

tickets.bugName: Ticket Table Count wrong after search cleared
tickets.longDescription: Upon clearing the search input in the tickets table, the amount of rows shown again is one less than the limiter in the top left
tickets.shortDescription: After the search bar is cleared, the amount of rows showing is 1 too little
tickets.stepsToReproduce:
1. Go to Dashboard
2. Search using search bar in tickets table
3. Press x to clear search term and observe ticket table rows/count
